column1: I didn’t expect there is such powerful human living in Gensokyo.
I’m only an ordinary hermit among the other hermits though.
So you are a hermit after all.
Speaking of hermits, you remind me of Miko.
Do you mean Toyosatomimi no Miko?
Well, my practice of Hermit's Ways is different from other hermits.
I am a hermit that practices the true Way of hermits.
care taking me to visit the Outside World?
I don’t remember making that promise.
